alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:25PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Santa Cruz County through 400 PM MST... At 325 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Patagonia, or 16 miles northeast of Nogales, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Patagonia. This includes Route 82 between mile markers 13 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
